article_title: Benefits U Launches Private Individual Health Insurance Marketplace for Colleges and Universities
article_text:
FAIRFIELD, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Benefits U announced today the launch of their new private individual health insurance marketplace for colleges and universities. Benefits U has partnered with GoHealth to provide this unique service at no cost to Colleges and Universities throughout the country.

“We are excited about partnering with GoHealth and being able to offer a solution to the Higher Education community to help those that need assistance finding and enrolling in an individual health insurance plan. Colleges and Universities often have a large number of part-time employees, adjunct faculty and even students who are not eligible for health insurance through the Institution. Through our partnership with GoHealth we have created a solution that allows those individuals to be able to shop online for individual health insurance and receive expert advice from licensed advisors,” says Timothy Tracy Jr., co-founder of Benefits U.

The GoHealth Benefits U Marketplace provides education and accessibility to a wide range of individual insurance options. It allows consumers to compare benefits from the nation’s top insurance carriers, apply for subsidies (which reduce health insurance premiums and out-of-pocket expenses), and enroll in an individual health insurance plan. GoHealth also provides free decision support tools and guidance from licensed insurance advisors to help connect insurance shoppers with the right plan.

Benefits U will be hosting a number of free webinars over the next few months so that Colleges and Universities can learn more about this new, exciting, and FREE solution. Institutions are urged to contact Benefits U to sign up for one the webinars.

Benefits U

Benefits U is the Higher Education consulting division of Gerard B. Tracy Associates, Inc. an insurance brokerage and advisory firm specializing in providing employee benefits to the Higher Education marketplace for over 65 years. The company is headquartered in Fairfield, CT. To learn more about Benefits U visit our website.

GoHealth

GoHealth is a Chicago-based company that powers GoHealthInsurance.com, a private health insurance marketplace that has helped more than 30 million consumers shop for coverage. With world-class technology and a team of licensed insurance advisors, GoHealth helps individuals and families obtain the right health insurance coverage. Working with 300 health insurance companies, GoHealth enables consumers to easily compare and shop for a variety of brand-name health plans. GoHealth provides plan recommendations and enrollment support by phone and online at no cost to consumers. In 2013, the GoHealth Marketplace became the first private exchange to enroll consumers in subsidized health insurance under the Affordable Care Act. In addition to powering a private marketplace, GoHealth licenses technology solutions and provides business process outsourcing services related to individual health insurance. GoHealth was founded in 2001. For more information visit our website, follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook.
